name: Bee-Bots
description:
The Forest Is In danger! A viral attack has taken over the local mechanical wildlife in the sacred Techno-Tree, Infesting them with dark powers and malicious software. Luckily your hive managed to just barely escape before the infection occurred. Now you must choose, if your going to take flight, or would rather fight!

Using the powers of Bee-atrice and the Bee Bots Climb the tree to defeat the Viral Scourge that is present. This game is A Platform based around a Bee Swarm trying to save their home tree from a viral infection that has come from space to take over the tree, and then the world! You’ll need to climb to the top, Take on infested wildlife and then defeat the cause of the disaster.

The Game follows the theme of “Joined Together” by having your team up with a swarm of Bee Bots, to form a hive system. Every action you do is influenced by the Bee bots. Protect the queen bee at all cost, and have her make more bots to continue with that duty. Only by working as one can you overcome the scourge. Controls – Use WSAD for movement Space to Jump Left Click to attack Right Click to Activate Shields Ctrl – Summon BeeBots
